name: Frictional Games Flashback File
summary: Script file referenced by games created by Frictional Games like the Amnesia series; contains data in XML format referenced by the game to show text and play sound effects during character "flashbacks"; points to sound files like .OGG and .SFX files to play sound effects.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Frictional Games Amnesia: The Dark Descent

macos.display_name: Frictional Games Amnesia: A Machine for Pigs
Frictional Games Amnesia: The Dark Descent
